de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.extension
Interface IExtensionPoint

All Known Implementing Classes:
Draft2007DeleteStyle, Draft2007FlwrStyle, Draft2007InsertStyle, Draft2007MergeStyle, Draft2007SelectStlye, Draft2007UpdateStyle, MajortomExtension
public interface IExtensionPoint

Base interface definition of an extension point of the TMQL engine.

Author:
Sven Krosse

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getExtensionPointId()
          Each extension point has to define an unique extension point id used to represent the extension point in context of the current TMQL runtime.
 java.util.Set<ILanguageExtension> getLanguageExtensions()
          Returns all language extensions of this extension point
 void registerExtension(ITMQLRuntime runtime)
          Method called by the runtime to register the extension endpoint before running the query process.
 

Method Detail

registerExtension

void registerExtension(ITMQLRuntime runtime)
                       throws TMQLExtensionRegistryException
Method called by the runtime to register the extension endpoint before running the query process.

Parameters:
runtime - the calling runtime
Throws:
TMQLExtensionRegistryException - thrown if an exception caused by the internal runtime

getExtensionPointId

java.lang.String getExtensionPointId()
Each extension point has to define an unique extension point id used to represent the extension point in context of the current TMQL runtime. If two extension points has the same identifier the extension adpater will throw an exception during the initialization time of extension points on startup.

Returns:
the unique id

getLanguageExtensions

java.util.Set<ILanguageExtension> getLanguageExtensions()
Returns all language extensions of this extension point

Returns:
the language extensions
